name: Balanced Heavy Axe
description: A finely crafted hatchet with a wonderful balance that harnesses the full strength of its wielder's body, making its weight almost imperceptible. However, this feature is not so friendly once the wielder is injured.

tier.effect: When [Healthy], ATK increases by 6%.
When [Healthy], ATK increases by 12%.

name: Brutal Axe
description: The only thing that can sate this axe's bloodlust are the seemingly endless wars.

tier.effect: Increases HP by 3%. When attacking, if the enemy's HP percentage is higher than the character, ignores 20% of the target's DEF.
Increases HP by 10%. When attacking, if the enemy's HP percentage is higher than the character, ignores 40% of the target's DEF.

name: Denail Hammer
description: Using it too much can create a distance between oneself and others.

tier.effect: When charging, deals 5% more DMG. If targets who have lower HP than the character are knocked bakc, pushes them back by 1 more tile.
When charging, deals 25% more DMG. If targets who have lower HP than the character are knocked bakc, pushes them back by 1 more tile.

name: Feast Axe
description: Start your revelry! Just remember to clean up afterwards.

tier.effect: If the target's HP percentage is lower than the character's when attacking, increases ATK by 10%. The character recovers 20% HP when defeating an enemy. CD: 3 turns.
If the target's HP percentage is lower than the character's when attacking, increases ATK by 20%. The character recovers 35% HP when defeating an enemy. CD: 1 turns.

name: Hollow Axe
description: The hollow of the axe is like an abyss, in which all magic, together with its source, is captured, swallowed, and transformed.

tier.effect: Increases DEF by 5%. Gains bonus P.ATK equal to 5% P.DEF and M.DEF at the start of the battle.
Increases DEF by 10%. Gains bonus P.ATK equal to 10% P.DEF and M.DEF at the start of the battle.

name: Tuning Hammer
description: The tuning hammer was originally used by the Union to check the tuning of the holy bells in various concil halls. However, it was later discovered taht this hammer had a remarkable effect when used to educate enemies, with most of them confessing their crimes after the first strike.

tier.effect: Increases P.ATK by 5%. Dispels 1 [buff] from the target before attacking.
Increases P.ATK by 10%. Dispels 2 [buff] from the target before attacking.

name: Irian Combat Bow
description: Made with lightweight yet sturdy materials, it can endure a certain amount of melee damage which makes it ideal for special operatives who might need to make a hasty retreat.

tier.effect: Increases P.ATK by 1%. Deals 10% more DMG when not in the character's turn.
Increases P.ATK by 5%. Deals 20% more DMG when not in the character's turn.

name: Longbow of Martyrs
description: This longbow is a preacious relic from the Radiant War II. It has been wielded by many outstanding knights in defense of their vows. Anyone who proves capable of wielding this who proves capable of wielding this bow will win the respect and support of the knights, and anyone struck by its arrows will find themselves marked as an enemy of the people.

tier.effect: Increases P.ATK by 2%. After Single-target active attack deals DMG, inflicts [Longbow of Martyrs] for 1 turn.
Increases P.ATK by 10%. After Single-target active attack deals DMG, inflicts [Longbow of Martyrs] for 1 turn.

name: Melee Mega Crossbow
description: Prioritizing power at the expense of range, this weapon fulfills every archer's melee dream!

tier.effect: Minimum Range -1, increases DMG dealt by 16%. For each 1 additional tile away from the target (Distance for Adjacent Tiles counts as 0), DMG dealt decreases by 8%, up to a reduction of 32%.
Minimum Range -1, increases DMG dealt by 32%. For each 1 additional tile away from the target (Distance for Adjacent Tiles counts as 0), DMG dealt decreases by 5%, up to a reduction of 20%.

name: Meteor Line
description: Blessed by the stars, firing arrows that even fly through the Sea of Chaos. Finding them again may be difficult

tier.effect: Increases P.ATK by 1%. After dealing DMG with single-target attacks, inflicts 1 random [Level 1 Debuff] for 2 turns.
Increases P.ATK by 5%. After dealing DMG with single-target attacks, inflicts 2 random [Level 1 Debuff] for 2 turns.

name: Star-Raid Crossbow
description: This crossbow was once wielded by a former city defense general of the Union during a protracted night-time siege. Its bolts flew like shooting stars dazzlingly fast and accurate, maintaining the defenders' high morale and turning the hopeless situation into a victorious one.

tier.effect: Increases Crit by 6%. If a single-target active attack deals Crit DMG, there is a 50% chance to additionally deal 20% P.ATK as [Piercing DMG] to the target.
Increases Crit by 15%. If a single-target active attack deals Crit DMG, there is a 100% chance to additionally deal 20% of the character's P.ATK as [Piercing DMG] to the target.

name: Vlderian Longbow
description: This is the signature weapon for Vlder's soldiers, made from the familiar wood of their homeland. Even in mass production, it boasts a level of precision unmatched by other techniques of similar cost.

tier.effect: Before a single-target attack if the distance to the target is 4 tiles or more, Crit increases by 5%.
Before a single-target attack if the distance to the target is 4 tiles or more, Crit increases by 25%.

name: Whale Hunter
description: According to legend, it was once used to hunt the largest prey in the Sea of Chaos. With the Sea of Chaos now devoid of life, the Whale Hunter awaits a new purpose.

tier.effect: After dealing DMG with single-target active attacks, gains a 50% chance to inflict [Infection] on the target, which can be triggered up to 1 time per round. Deals 20% more DMG to the enemies with [Infection].
After dealing DMG with single-target active attacks, inflicts [Infection] on the target, which can be triggered up to 1 time per round. Deals 20% more DMG to the enemies with [Infection].

name: Doomsday Scythe
description: A sickle emitting an aura of decay that can unleash its maximum power when silently approaching enemies.

tier.effect: When Launching a [back attack], DMG increases by 12%
When Launching a [back attack], DMG increases by 25%

name: Double-Sided Halberd
description: This uniquely shaped halberd is both offensice and defensive, allowing worthy wielders to skillfully counter most attacks and make opponents think twice about launching a reckless assault.

tier.effect: Increases P.ATK by 5%. For each target hit when attacking, increases DMG by 3%, up to 9%.
Increases P.ATK by 5%. For each target hit when attacking, increases DMG by 8%, up to 24%.

name: Nameless Staff
description: An antique designed to be deceptively solid, this weapon has its weight distributed to both ends. It can be swung with ease and still generate enough force to penetrate armor and cause internal damage to enemies. It appears to have come from the Far East.

tier.effect: Increases Movement by 1 tile. Increases Crit by 3% if moved no less than 3 tiles before attacking.
Increases Movement by 1 tile. Increases Crit by 15% if moved no less than 3 tiles before attacking.

name: Pendant Halberd
description: This exquisite halberd performs well in both offense and defense. The halberd head is adorned with some cute decorations, maybe the daughter of the previous owner placed it there on a whim.

tier.effect: Increses HP by 2%. Before taking a [single-target attack], gains 10% bonus ATK and DEF.
Increses HP by 10%. Before taking a [single-target attack], gains 10% bonus ATK and DEF.

name: Skeleton Spear
description: This legendary spear is crafted from the bones of fallen warriors, infused with sorrow, rage, and hatred, striking fear into the hearts of enemies as they are dragged into the depths.

tier.effect: Increases P.ATK by 2%. Before initiating a single-target active attack, additionally deals [Piercing DMG] equal to 10% P.ATK to the target
Increases P.ATK by 10%. Before initiating a single-target active attack, additionally deals [Piercing DMG] equal to 10% P.ATK to the target

name: The Silent Gaurd
description: Endure, build up, and strike down the enemy in one hit--the princibples one must abide by to become a formidable guard.

tier.effect: When actively attacked, DEF increases by 10%. The next attack deals 15% more DMG.
When actively attacked, DEF increases by 30%. The next attack deals 25% more DMG.

name: Diffusing Prism
description: This Luxite was carved using a special technique, and can greatly amplify the caster's abilities, engulfing hordes of enemies like a surging wave.

tier.effect: Increases M.ATK by 5%. Upon casting AoE Attack, for each 1 target hit, increases [magical DMG] and [piercing DMG] dealt by 5%, up to 10%.
Increases M.ATK by 10%. Upon casting AoE Attack, for each 1 target hit, increases [magical DMG] and [piercing DMG] dealt by 10%, up to 20%.

name: Focus Wand
description: After carefully grinding several pieces of Luxite into specific arc shapes, they are combined with a wand to more precisely converge the effects of Luxite Blessing. The original crafter of this wand was also responsible for the lighting design of the Knight's Council Hall.

tier.effect: When [unharmed], increases the maximum range of [single-target skills] by 1 tile and increases M.ATK by 3% when launching a single-target Attack.
When [unharmed], increases the maximum range of [single-target skills] by 1 tile and increases M.ATK by 15% when launching a single-target Attack.

name: Gazing Orb
description: An eerie crystal ball seems to stare back with an unfathomable pupil when looked upon deeply, gradually causing the world to fade away, leaving only oneself and profound abyss.

tier.effect: Deals 6% more DMG when performing a single-target attack.
Deals 15% more DMG when performing a single-target attack.

name: Reorganized Cube
description: It is a tool that can restore order to chaos and return things to their original state. Please note, however, that this is not time travel, and the moments you've lost will never return to you.

tier.effect: Increses Healing Effect by 3%. When using a skill on an ally, additionally dispels 1 [debuff].
Increses Healing Effect by 15%. When using a skill on an ally, additionally dispels 1 [debuff].

name: Resentment Broom
description: It was originally a powerful healing wand specially crafted by a Sorceress as a token of love for her sweetheart. However, the recipient betrayed her, and the curse began to spread.

tier.effect: Increases [AoE DMG] by 15%. After dealing DMG with an Active Attack, there is a 25% chance to inflict [Life Loss] equal to 20% M.ATK on the target for 1 turn.
Increases [AoE DMG] by 15%. After dealing DMG with an Active Attack, there is a 50% chance to inflict [Life Loss] equal to 20% M.ATK on the target for 1 turn.

name: Skeleton Staff
description: The gloomy yet stylish bone wand is the last legacy of a prominent Sanctuary Priest in the Papal States. As long as its power is not depleted, the user's spirit will endure even after the body perishes.

tier.effect: Increases HP by 2%. Recovers 1 NRG when an ally is defeated in battle. The effect can be triggered up to 1 time per round.
Increases HP by 10%. Recovers 1 NRG when an ally is defeated in battle. The effect can be triggered up to 1 time per round.

name: Starry Sky Heritage
description: The lone star shoots through the depths of the night sky, culminating in a breathtaking finale of incredible brilliance.

tier.effect: Increases HP by 5%. Grants bonus M.ATK equal to 3% HP at the start of the battle.
Increases HP by 10%. Grants bonus M.ATK equal to 6% HP at the start of the battle.

name: Beheading Machete
description: An almost circular, hooked blade designed for efficient beheading of enemies by the hanged Men from high places, or for painfully suspending enemies in the air. It has also become a form of torture in the Papal States.

tier.effect: When attacking from [Highland], ATK increases by 6%.
When attacking from [Highland], ATK increases by 15%.

name: Dueling Dagger
description: With its uniquely designed gauntlet and a lightweight and highly durable blade, this sword empowers the wielders to easily parry many deadly attacks.

tier.effect: When attacked from [front or side], P.DEF increases by 5%.
When attacked from [front or side], P.DEF increases by 25%.

name: Ever-Burning Blade
description: This sword is the pinnacle of Luxite-infused weaponry. With its blade perpetually engulfed in flames, this extroardinary and symbolic sword still awaits a knight who can fully wield it.

tier.effect: After dealing DMG with single-target active attacks, gains a 50% chance to inflict [Scorch] on the target, which can be triggered up to 1 time per round. Deals 20% more DMG to the enemies with [Scorch].
After dealing DMG with single-target active attacks, inflicts [Scorch] on the target, which can be triggered up to 1 time per round. Deals 20% more DMG to the enemies with [scorch].

name: Gaurdian's Will
description: The brave girl lifted her long sword, her slender body no longer trembling beneath her cloak.

tier.effect: Incrases HP by 5%. When having [Shield], increases DEF by 20%.
Incrases HP by 10%. When having [Shield], increases DEF by 40%, and decreases DMG taken by 10%.

name: Newborn Blade
description: Forged in a miniaturized dimension, this sword is reborn after its destruction.

tier.effect: Increases HP by 5%. Grants bonus P.ATK equal to 3% HP at the start of the battle.
Increases HP by 10%. Grants bonus P.ATK equal to 6% HP at the start of the battle.

name: Precision-forged Dagger
description: Crafted by the sandwich steel technique with the blade forged from top-quality steel exclusively reserved for the royal gaurd, this sword may have been expensive to procure, but its sharpness is beyond doubt.

tier.effect: When actively attacking enemies with [▽ Move], P.ATK increases by 3%
When actively attacking enemies with [▽ Move], P.ATK increases by 15%

name: Senator Swift Sword
description: The Council of Knights once had a knight renowned for his elegant and swift swordplay, having never been defeated in a one-on-one duel. However, his superior skills were never passed down, and only his sword was left to be preserved for future generations.

tier.effect: Increases HP by 3%. After dealing DMG with single-target attacks, inflicts [▽ Move I] on the target for 1 turn.
Increases HP by 15%. After dealing DMG with single-target attacks, inflicts [▽ Move I] on the target for 1 turn.

name: Void Stab
description: The sounds from the void resonate as the blade slashes through the air.

tier.effect: Increases Crit by 3%. After using the skill, gains 1 stack of [Void]. Effect: Increases Crit DMG by 5% and can stack up to 6 times. The effect lasts until the end of the next 1 turn.
Increases Crit by 15%. After using the skill, gains 1 stack of [Void]. Effect: Increases Crit DMG by 5% and can stack up to 6 times. The effect lasts until the end of the next 2 turn.

name: Cornucopia Dagger
description: Many people have died by its sharp blade, but even more have survived because of it.

tier.effect: At the start of the turn, if the character is [Healthy], there is a 40% chance to recover 2 NRG. If the character is [Dying], there is a 40% chance to recover 30% HP. CD: 3 turns.
At the start of the turn, if the character is [Healthy], there is a 80% chance to recover 2 NRG. If the character is [Dying], there is a 80% chance to recover 30% HP. CD: 2 turns.

name: Cornucopia Spear
description: The dazzling elegance it exudes often makes one forget that it is still a powerful weapon.

tier.effect: At the start of the turn, if the character is [Healthy], there is a 40% chance to recover 2 NRG. If the character is [Dying], there is a 40% chance to recover 30% HP. CD: 3 turns.
At the start of the turn, if the character is [Healthy], there is a 80% chance to recover 2 NRG. If the character is [Dying], there is a 80% chance to recover 30% HP. CD: 2 turns.

name: Cornucopia Axe
description: Every bit of its weight is a response to the wielder's wishes.

tier.effect: At the start of the turn, if the character is [Healthy], there is a 40% chance to recover 2 NRG. If the character is [Dying], there is a 40% chance to recover 30% HP. CD: 3 turns.
At the start of the turn, if the character is [Healthy], there is a 80% chance to recover 2 NRG. If the character is [Dying], there is a 80% chance to recover 30% HP. CD: 2 turns.

name: Cornucopia Bow
description: Even through the passage of time, its nobility and purity have never been tarnished.

tier.effect: At the start of the turn, if the character is [Healthy], there is a 40% chance to recover 2 NRG. If the character is [Dying], there is a 40% chance to recover 30% HP. CD: 3 turns.
At the start of the turn, if the character is [Healthy], there is a 80% chance to recover 2 NRG. If the character is [Dying], there is a 80% chance to recover 30% HP. CD: 2 turns.

name: Cornucopia Staff
description: Was historically used to pray for a good harvest. Forged using long-lost techniques, this wand has the power to give life.

tier.effect: At the start of the turn, if the character is [Healthy], there is a 40% chance to recover 2 NRG. If the character is [Dying], there is a 40% chance to recover 30% HP. CD: 3 turns.
At the start of the turn, if the character is [Healthy], there is a 80% chance to recover 2 NRG. If the character is [Dying], there is a 80% chance to recover 30% HP. CD: 2 turns.

name: Dawnlight
description: It was originally the sword in Ditalio's hand, but was handed to Inanna in a critical moment. The tacit understanding between the brother and sister also stems from everyone's affirmation of Inanna's strength and courage after going through all kinds of hardships. The darkness has ended and the dawn is coming. Now the girl holding it has a firm and determined look in her eyes. No matter the unpredictable road ahead, whether it is smooth or bumpy, she will stride forward.

tier.effect: Magical AoE damage increased by 10% . After releasing support or healing skills to your allies, you gain [Power of Dawnlight 1], lasts for 2 rounds.
Magical AoE damage increased by 10% . After releasing support or healing skills to your allies, you gain [Power of Dawnlight 2], lasts for 2 rounds.

Magical AoE damage increased by 15% . After releasing support or healing skills to your allies, you gain [Power of Dawnlight 2], while both the self and the target gain [▲Attack 1], lasts for 2 rounds.

Magical AoE damage increased by 15% . After releasing support or healing skills to your allies, you gain [Power of Dawnlight 3], while both the self and the target gain [▲Attack 1], lasts for 2 rounds.

Magical AoE damage increased by 20% . After releasing support or healing skills to your allies, you gain [Power of Dawnlight 3], while both the self and the target gain [▲Attack 2], lasts for 2 rounds.

name: Dawnmoon
description: This was the sword that Silvia wore when she was a girl. After the War of Independence, Silvia gave the "Dawn Moon" to Inanna, who then gave it to her personal guard knight Aisha, who had accompanied her in sword training since childhood. The cold sword light, like the moonlight at dawn, is a faint light emitted between dawn and dusk every day, possessing a gentle and holy power.

tier.effect: Defense increased by 10% . When casting single-target [Professional Support Skill], both you and the target gain [Dawn Glow 1], which can be triggered once per battle at most . When healing a target with [Dawn Moon Glow 1], the target gains a random [Level 1 gain], lasts for 2 rounds, and each target can be triggered at most once per round .

Defense increased by 20% . When casting single-target [Professional Support Skill], both you and the target gain [Dawn Glow 1], which can be triggered once per battle at most . When healing a target with [Dawn Glow 1], the target gains a random [Level 1 gain], lasts for 2 rounds, and each target can be triggered at most once per round .

Defense increased by 20% . When casting single-target [Professional Support Skill], both you and the target gain [Dawn Glow 1], which can be triggered once per battle at most . When healing a target with [Dawn Glow 1], the target gains a random [Level 2 gain], lasts for 2 rounds, and each target can be triggered at most once per round .

Defense increased by 30% . When casting single-target [Professional Support Skill], both you and the target gain [Dawn Glow 1], which can be triggered once per battle at most . When healing a target with [Dawn Glow 1], the target gains a random [Level 2 gain], lasts for 2 rounds, and each target can be triggered at most once per round .

Defense increased by 30% . When casting single-target [Professional Support Skill], both you and the target gain [Dawn Glow 2], which can be triggered once per battle at most . When healing a target with [Dawn Glow 2], the target gains a random [Level 2 gain], lasts for 2 rounds, and each target can be triggered at most once per round .

name: Nocturnal Glow
description: A birthday present from Lavie during his military school days to Sophia. "You have to learn to protect yourself. If anyone bullies you in the future, just use this to poke them hard!" The sky in Langyong City was particularly sunny that day. The morning light shone through the girl's hair and onto the slender sword.

tier.effect: Increases attack and defense attributes by 4% . After releasing skills on friendly troops, dispel 1 of their [Debuff], and gain a random [Level 1 gain]、[Nocturnal Glow 1], lasts for 2 rounds.
Increases attack and defense attributes by 7% . After releasing skills on friendly troops, dispel 1 of their [Debuff], and gain a random [Level 1 gain]、[Nocturnal Glow 1], lasts for 2 rounds.
Increases attack and defense attributes by 7% . After releasing skills on friendly troops, dispel 2 of their [Debuff], and gain a random [Level 2 gain]、[Nocturnal Glow 1], lasts for 2 rounds.
Increases attack and defense attributes by 10% . After releasing skills on friendly troops, dispel 2 of their [Debuff], and gain a random [Level 2 gain]、[Nocturnal Glow 1], lasts for 2 rounds.
Increases attack and defense attributes by 10% . After releasing skills on friendly troops, dispel 2 of their [Debuff], and gain a random [Level 2 gain]、[Nocturnal Glow 2], lasts for 2 rounds.

name: Blade of Stratagem
description: A rapier hidden behind the scenes. Behind the tent, the person holding the chess piece is thoughtful and acts after careful planning. The times are treacherous and changeable, the waves are surging and the winds are rising. Chaos is precisely the ladder for planners. A new chess game has begun. Who will be the final winner?

tier.effect: Physical attack increased by 5% . When attacking enemy has 3 or more [Debuff], Critical Damage increases by 15% ; Outside of your own turn, Physical Attack increases by an additional 8% .
Physical attack increased by 5% . When attacking enemy has 3 or more [Debuff], Critical Damage increases by 20% ; Outside of your own turn, Physical Attack increases by an additional 10% .
Physical attack increased by 8% . When attacking enemy has 3 or more [Debuff], Critical Damage increases by 20% ; Outside of your own turn, Physical Attack increases by an additional 10% .
Physical attack increased by 8% . When attacking enemy has 3 or more [Debuff], Critical Damage increases by 25% ; Outside of your own turn, Physical Attack increases by an additional 14% .
Physical attack increased by 10% . When attacking enemy has 3 or more [Debuff], Critical Damage increases by 30% ; Outside of your own turn, Physical Attack increases by an additional 16% .

name: The dragon raises its head!
description: A legendary weapon guarded by two hundred hellhounds, its crooked lines are traces of family inheritance, and its bumpy textures are medals of the ancestors' countless victories. The enormous power contained in it is enough to shake the entire ice field, and only the descendants of the two-headed dragon can stimulate and use it. ——Master Li said this while holding a sledgehammer after getting drunk on milk.

tier.effect: release [Range Attack] and trigger [Counter Attack]、[Preemptive], for each target hit, the [Physical Damage] caused increases by 5% , up to a maximum of 15% .
release [Range Attack] and trigger [Counter Attack]、[Preemptive], for each target hit, the [Physical Damage] caused increases by 6% , up to a maximum of 18% .

release [Range Attack] and trigger [Counter Attack]、[Preemptive], for each target hit, the [Physical Damage] caused increases by 7% , up to a maximum of 21% . [Counterattack] and [Preemptive] times are increased by 1 , which can generate 15% [Life Drain].

release [Range Attack] and trigger [Counter Attack]、[Preemptive], for each target hit, the [Physical Damage] caused increases by 8% , up to a maximum of 24% . [Counterattack] and [Preemptive] times are increased by 1 , which can generate 15% [Life Drain].

release [Range Attack] and trigger [Counter Attack]、[Preemptive], for each target hit, the [Physical Damage] caused increases by 10% , up to a maximum of 30% . [Counterattack] and [Preemptive] times are increased by 1 , which can generate 15% [Life Drain].

name: "Barbecue" hammer
description: The Meteor Team's secret weapon is designed to look like a barbecue. It is lightweight, inexpensive, and can even be folded for storage! To unleash its full power, you must fully comprehend the indomitable spirit of the Meteor Team and silently recite "The Meteor Team is invincible!" when wielding it.

tier.effect: Increases physical attack by 2% . Before attacking a single target 5 squares or more away, increases physical attack by an additional 15% .
Increases physical attack by 3% . Before attacking a single target 4 squares or more away, increases physical attack by an additional 15% .
Increases physical attack by 3% . Before attacking a single target 4 squares or more away, increases physical attack by an additional 20% .
Increases physical attack by 4% . Before attacking a single target 3 squares or more away, increases physical attack by an additional 20% .
Increases physical attack by 5% . Before attacking a single target 3 squares or more away, increases physical attack by an additional 25% .

name: Super Heavy Assault Blade
description: The people of Lily of the Valley town specially made a heavy giant blade for the fully armored Mesha. It takes the joint efforts of many parties to move it, but it is easy to move in the hands of the girl. Perhaps it was because of the determination to protect, or perhaps it was because of the sharpness in my heart to attack. The warm little sun of the past is now rising vigorously. That uplifting and dazzling light is enough to illuminate the road to the future...

tier.effect: Increases maximum health by 5% , damage and penetration damage by 4% .[Coordinated Command] Skill triggers allies [Collaborative response] before, the target gains [Super Heavy Assault 1], lasts for 1 round.

Increases maximum health by 10% , damage and penetration damage by 4% .[Coordinated Command] Skill triggers allies [Collaborative response] before, the target gains [Super Heavy Assault 1], lasts for 1 round.

Increases maximum health by 10% , damage and penetration damage by 7% .[Coordinated Command] Skill triggers allies [Collaborative response] before, the target gains [Super Heavy Assault 2], lasts for 1 round.

Increases maximum health by 15% , damage and penetration damage by 7% .[Coordinated Command] Skill triggers allies [Collaborative response] before, the target gains [Super Heavy Assault 2], lasts for 1 round.

Increases maximum health by 20% , damage and penetration damage by 10% .[Coordinated Command] Skill triggers allies [Collaborative response] before, the target gains [Super Heavy Assault 3], lasts for 1 round.

name: Good Travel Partner
description: Kokona carries a large iron pot with her, and every fine scratch on the pot records a thrilling adventure. It can be used to make all kinds of imaginative dishes, and it is also very useful for self-defense during battle. "Attention everyone! It's time to eat!"

tier.effect: HP increased by 5% , healing effect increased by 5%. When healing, dispel 1 target [Debuffs], effective once per target per round at most .
HP increased by 8% , healing effect increased by 8%. When healing, dispel 1 target [Debuffs], effective once per target per round at most .
HP increased by 8% , healing effect increased by 8%. When healing, dispel 1 target [Debuffs], and apply [▲ Treatment 1], lasts for 2 rounds, effective once per target per round at most .
HP increased by 12% , healing effect increased by 12%. When healing, dispel 1 target [Debuffs], and apply [▲ Treatment 1], lasts for 2 rounds, effective once per target per round at most .
HP increased by 15% , healing effect increased by 15%. When healing, dispel 1 target [Debuffs], and apply [▲ Treatment 2], lasts for 2 rounds, effective once per target per round at most .

name: Frostspine Grips
description: Always at the most appropriate time, this piece of spine would flap its wings in the hands of the Silver Wolf Queen. Every step forward, every decision, as long as the tribe's seal responds to the silent whispers of their ancestors, the future of the ice field will rise where her fingertips point.

tier.effect: HP increased by 4% . Before attacking, for every 3 squares of movement and charge distance, damage and penetration damage increased by 2% , which can be stacked, up to 10% , and the effect lasts until the end of the action.

HP increased by 8% . Before attacking, for every 2 squares of movement and charge distance, damage and penetration damage increased by 2% , which can be stacked, up to 10% , and the effect lasts until the end of the action.

HP increased by 12% . Before attacking, for every 2 squares of movement and charge distance, damage and penetration damage increased by 2% , which can be stacked, up to 10% , and the effect lasts until the end of the action.

HP increased by 16% . Before attacking, for every 2 squares of movement and charge distance, damage and penetration damage increased by 3% , which can be stacked, up to 15% , and the effect lasts until the end of the action.

HP increased by 20% . Before attacking, for every 2 squares of movement and charge distance, damage and penetration damage increased by 4% , which can be stacked, up to 20% , and the effect lasts until the end of the action.

name: Gale Sword
description: In Sofia's tactical arrangement, Lavie would always kick the door open, then hold the sword and chase a group of prisoners until they were exhausted, like a hero. "As long as Sofia is here, all I have to do is charge! She can take care of everything else!"

tier.effect: Increases physical attack by 2%. After attacking, increases critical damage by 9% until the end of the action.
Increases physical attack by 4%. After attacking, increases critical damage by 12% until the end of the action.
Increases physical attack by 6%. After attacking, increases critical damage by 15% until the end of the action.
Increases physical attack by 8%. After attacking, increases critical damage by 18% until the end of the action.
Increases physical attack by 10%. After attacking, increases critical damage by 21% until the end of the action.

name: Army-Breaking Spear
description: It is said that during the War of Independence, a general repeatedly charged into the enemy camp alone with this gun, inspiring Elijah's soldiers to fight bravely, and ultimately won one victory after another with a smaller force. However, the loyal general finally died in a conspiracy in the dark night. The general's armor shone brightly in the sun, and the spear beside her still shone with an unyielding light.

tier.effect: Critical hit chance and attack increased by 4% . Before attacking, if the sum of movement, charge, and teleport distance is greater than or equal to 6 , use non-[Instant] After attacking with a skill, the skill cooldown will be reset to zero and the consumed energy will be returned. This effect has a cooldown of 7 turns.

name: Magic Ladle
description: The soup spoon is made of black walnut and is engraved with many unrecognizable symbols and words. Just put it into the soup pot and you will get a dark dish that will shock your taste buds, vision and stomach. The correct way to use it is to give it to your enemy.

name: Life Fondness
description: The staff, which relies on the power of the crystal to maintain its vitality, will be revitalized the moment it touches the earth, like seeds that have long been blessed by rain. Roots are intertwined and interdependent, this is the way plants grow, and perhaps... it is the same for people.

tier.effect: When casting a single-target [Support] skill, grant it a random [Level 1 gain], lasts for 2 rounds. If the target is a [Summoning Character], it will gain an additional [Life Fondness 1], lasting for 2 rounds; the [Life Fondness] effect can be applied up to 1 time every 3 rounds .

When casting a single-target [Support] skill, grant it a random [Level 1 gain], lasts for 2 rounds. If the target is a [Summoning Character], it will gain an additional [Life Fondness 1], lasting for 2 rounds; the [Life Fondness] effect can be applied up to 1 time every 2 rounds .

When casting a single-target [Support] skill, grant it a random [Level 2 gain], lasts for 3 rounds. If the target is a [Summoning Character], it will gain an additional [Life Fondness 2], lasting for 3 rounds; the [Life Fondness] effect can be applied up to 1 time every 1 rounds .

name: Dream Turbidity
description: People no longer know which fortune teller first created this dream catcher that collects nightmares, with what desire. However, as if to echo the unpredictable nature of dreams, this crystallization of evil intentions can also be used to fight against real evil in reality. The dream web woven in this way banishes beautiful dreams and allows the darkest nightmares to stay, accumulate, and condense.

tier.effect: At the start of the battle, gain 1 layer [Dream Omen-Doom 1]. After actively using [Professional Skill]: If [Healing] is used, 1 [Debuff] will be dispelled, and you will gain 1 layer of [Dream Omen-Doom 1]; If [Piercing Damage] is used, you gain 1 layer of [Dream Omen: Life 1].

name: Nightmare Puppet
description: he puppet is carved with a hound's skull, and its interlaced fangs are chilling. A blood crystal is inserted in the puppet. People who are stared at by the red eyes of a hound often feel like they have fallen into a chess game set by some big shot, at the mercy of others and with nowhere to escape. "Human fear, madness, and greed are all pawns."

tier.effect: Magic attack and health increased by 4% . After dealing damage, inflict a random [Level 1 Debuff]; If you use the [Debuff] skill, the effect becomes: After attacking, apply a random [Level 2 Debuff]、[Nightmare Puppet 1], lasts for 2 rounds.

name: Light of Destruction
description: When the night falls, wars rage, crimes run rampant, and all living beings are trapped in water and fire. Only the Judge, in the name of glory, holds the rod of judgment, purges all evil, dispels the endless darkness, and awakens the dawn. - Excerpt from "The Radiant Doctrine"

name: Nirvana
description: The blazing flame is the eternal dance, and the ashes are the nourishment for rebirth. The Firebird cannot be caged.

name: Paradox Crystal Chain
description: After the dark transformation, Wilde girl Momo gradually began to adapt to and master the special power from the crystal. For a good weapon… "Shackles represent freedom, and scars represent strength."
